title: Promotional games
body: Anyone here understand why when you hit promotional games that the avg skill lv of your teams drops so low the Titanic would be looking down at them.

replies.body:
You're not alone. See my other threads:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/uMBpGhER-can-we-get-some-feedback-on-how-mm-works-in-promo-series-games

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/T1J8TH3I-i-cant-handle-this-game-any-more-heres-why

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/VaBFMEH7-losing-promos-from-trolls-and-bads
To keep you where you belong.

because otherwise everyone would be Challenger, Riot have to make the climb hard somehow

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
